text: Sophia Bush (born July 8, 1982) is an American television and movie actress. She has also directed. She appeared in movies that include John Tucker Must Die. Television programs in which she appeared include Chicago Hope, Chicago PD and "One Tree Hill". Bush was born in Pasadena, California. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Pasadena, California Category:1982 births Category:Living people
title: Sophia Bush
